thoughts.text: I have saved the top attractions in the world to a file. Now I can use the read_file command to read the contents of the file.
thoughts.reasoning: I have saved the top attractions in the world to a file and I want to read the contents of the file. The read_file command can be used to read the contents of the file.
thoughts.plan: - Use the read_file command to read the contents of the top_attractions.txt file.
